content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'root_synpasedlstore_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [root_synpasedlstore_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://root@synpasedlstore.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Nation (
	[N_NATIONKEY] numeric(38,0),
	[N_NAME] nvarchar(4000),
	[N_REGIONKEY] numeric(38,0),
	[N_COMMENT] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'tpch/NATION/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [root_synpasedlstore_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.Nation
GO

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synpasedlstore.dfs.core.windows.net/root/tpch/PART/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]


IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'root_synpasedlstore_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [root_synpasedlstore_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://root@synpasedlstore.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE customer (
	[C_CUSTKEY] numeric(9,0),
	[C_NAME] nvarchar(4000),
	[C_ADDRESS] nvarchar(4000),
	[C_NATIONKEY] numeric(38,0),
	[C_PHONE] nvarchar(4000),
	[C_ACCTBAL] numeric(9,2),
	[C_MKTSEGMENT] nvarchar(4000),
	[C_COMMENT] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'tpch/CUSTOMER/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [root_synpasedlstore_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synpasedlstore.dfs.core.windows.net/root/tpch/PART/**',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
